channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain once again needs repair, 7th February
item.description:
The drain has sunken and whilst I'm sure this was patched up only very recently, it's almmost back to normal - i.e. needs fixing. This must be the 3rd or 4th time !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hazard to road users, particularly those on two wheels, 7th February
item.description:
Along the length of New Barn Lane between the Bouncers Lane roundabout and the park and ride roundabout there are numerous hazardous potholes. Many of these are hazardous to two wheel rod users. Cyclists, motorcyclists and e-scooter users who, despite their best efforts to avoid the hazards, hit them are likely to be thrown from their vehicles resulting in serious injury or death.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 209, New Barn Lane, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, 6th February
item.description:
There are numerous potholes in the carriageway causing an uncomfortable experience when travelling Westbound away from the Hot Air Balloon roundabout towards Gloucester. The potholes are without 80m after leaving the roundabout heading towards Gloucester/M5. The potholes start on the offside of the road mainly.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
